title: Plat 1 player looking for very active team wanting to grind 5s ladder and enter tourneys.
body:
Hello my name is Tyron,  I'm really not a fan of soloq and i much prefer teamplay.
I main fill so i can fit into most roles but i do have a preference. ADC > Support > MID > Jungle > Top.
I can play meta champions and can use teamspeak/skype etc.

Add me in-game or reply here :)

replies.body: hi im keen to play 5s and im on pretty much everyday. ill add u.
